name: Seize The Day Dining
description:
Welcome to the restaurant! Have a seat. Peruse the menu. What kind of day will you have today?

A short narrative game about an all-encompassing dining experience. Best played fullscreen.

Made for GJL Game Parade 2020

Script/story by Jack Sanderson Thwaite

https://www.jacksandersonthwaite.com/

Music/sound by Samuel Hollywood-Summers 

https://www.samuelhollywoodsummers.com/
